titles.title: Providing for further consideration of the bill (H.R. 4301) to authorize appropriations for fiscal year 1995 for military activities of the Department of Defense, to prescribe military personnel strengths for fiscal year 1995, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 103-520, by Mr. Frost.
Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 4301. Providing for the further consideration of the bill in the Committee of the Whole. Measure will be read by section. Specified amendments are in order.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 164.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 5/20/1994--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the further consideration of H.R. 4301 (National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 1995).
